display_name: RFXItem transformation - 1000 - RAW test data sets_31 - Ariba Sourcing - 4

property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT 
    'RFXItem_' || "RFXItem"."ItemId" || '_' || "RFXItem"."VersionId"   as "ID",
    --'RFXDocument_' || "RFXDocument"."InternalId" AS "RFXDocument",
    "RFXItem"."ItemId" as "ItemId",
    "RFXItem"."VersionId" as "VersionId",
    "RFXItem"."Description" as "Description",
    cast("RFXItem"."EnvelopeId" as int) as "EnvelopedIf",
    "RFXItem"."IsRealItem" as "IsRealItem",
    "RFXItem"."SoftDelete" as "SoftDelete",
    CASE 
        WHEN "RFXItem"."ItemType" = 'RootSectionItemType' THEN 'Root Section Item'
        WHEN "RFXItem"."ItemType" = 'SectionItemType' THEN 'Section Item'
        WHEN "RFXItem"."ItemType" = 'QuestionItemType' THEN 'Question Item'
        WHEN "RFXItem"."ItemType" = 'LineItemType' THEN 'Line Item'
        WHEN "RFXItem"."ItemType" = 'LotItemType' THEN 'Lot Item'
        WHEN "RFXItem"."ItemType" = 'CostItemType' THEN 'Cost Item'
        WHEN "RFXItem"."ItemType" = 'KPIItemType' THEN 'KPI Item'
        ELSE "RFXItem"."ItemType"
    END as "ItemType",
    "RFXItem"."DecimalPrecision" as "DecimalPrecision",
    "RFXItem"."arb_RequisitionLineItemNumber" as "ArbRequisitionLineItemNumber",
    "RFXItem"."arb_RequisitionId" as "ArbRequisitionId",
    "RFXItem"."LineNumber" as "LineNumber",
    "RFXItem"."ItemSubType" as "ItemSubType",
    TIMESTAMPADD(HOUR,<%=TimezoneOffset%>,cast("RFXItem"."TimeCreated" as timestamp)) as "TimeCreated",
    "RFXItem"."arb_Plant" as "ArbPlant",
    "RFXItem"."arb_Incoterms" as "ArbIncoterms",
    "RFXItem"."arb_RFQLineItemNumber" as "ArbRfqLineItemNumber",
    "RFXItem"."Commodity" as "Commodity",
    "RFXItem"."Numbering" as "Numbering",
    "RFXItem"."TargetScore" as "TargetScore",
    "RFXItem"."ParticipantReadOnlyItem" as "ParticipantReadOnlyItem",
    "RFXItem"."arb_MaterialNumber" as "ArbMaterialNumber",
    "RFXItem"."arb_MaterialGroup" as "ArbMaterialGroup",
    "RFXItem"."arb_MaterialCode" as "ArbMaterialCode",
    "RFXItem"."Title" as "Title",
    TIMESTAMPADD(HOUR,<%=TimezoneOffset%>,"RFXItem"."TimeUpdated") as "TimeUpdated",
    "RFXItem"."Weight" as "Weight",
    "RFXItem"."ParentItemId" as "ParentItemId",
    "RFXItem"."Active" as "Active",
    "RFXItem"."NextVersion" as "NextVersion",
    "RFXItem"."LinkedItemId" as "LinkedItemId",
    "RFXItem"."RootItemId" as "RootItemId",
    "RFXItem"."arb_ItemCategory" as "ArbItemCategory",
    "RFXItem"."ExternalSystemCorrelationId" as "ExternalSystemCorrelationId",
    "RFXItem"."arb_RFQId" as "ArbRfqId",
    "RFXItem"."arb_MaterialType" as "ArbMaterialType",
    TIMESTAMPADD(HOUR,<%=TimezoneOffset%>,"RFXItem"."LastUpdateDate") as "LastUpdateDate",
    "RFXItem"."Description_DefaultStringTranslation" as "DescriptionDefaultStringTranslation",
    "RFXItem"."Commodity_Domain" as "CommodityDomain",
    "RFXItem"."Commodity_UniqueName" as "CommodityUniqueName",
    "RFXItem"."Currency_UniqueName" as "CurrencyUniqueName",
    "RFXItem"."Title_DefaultStringTranslation" as "TitleDefaultStringTranslation",
    "RFXItem"."NextVersion_UniqueName" as "NextVersionUniqueName"
FROM "RfXItem" as "RFXItem"
--LEFT JOIN "RFXDocument" ON 1 = 1
--    AND "RFXDocument"."Content_RootItemId" = "RFXItem"."RootItemId"
--    AND "RFXDocument"."DocumentVersion" = "RFXItem"."VersionId"
WHERE 1=1
    AND "RfXItem"."Active" = 'true'

sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT 
    'RFXItem_' || "RFXItem"."ItemId" || '_' || "RFXItem"."VersionId"   as "ID",
    'RFXDocument_' || "RFXDocument"."InternalId" AS "RFXDocument"
FROM "RfXItem" as "RFXItem"
JOIN "RFXDocument" ON 1 = 1
    AND "RFXDocument"."Content_RootItemId" = "RFXItem"."RootItemId"
    AND "RFXDocument"."DocumentVersion" = "RFXItem"."VersionId"
